result.rule: "import" statements after other statements are not allowed (arkts-no-misplaced-imports)
Importing directly from "JS" module is not supported (arkts-interop-js2s-import-js)
Casting interop JS objects to primitive types is not allowed (arkts-interop-js2s-convert-js-type)
API is not support initial ctor signature (arkts-builtin-new-cotr)
Type inference in case of generic function calls is limited (arkts-no-inferred-generic-params)
Casting interop JS objects to primitive types is not allowed (arkts-interop-js2s-convert-js-type)
Casting interop JS objects to primitive types is not allowed (arkts-interop-js2s-convert-js-type)
Casting interop JS objects to primitive types is not allowed (arkts-interop-js2s-convert-js-type)
